channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NV
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NV

item.title: Report X-2023120321
item.description:
Report X-2023120321

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-21T18:11:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-02
  • City: SPARKS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package found leaking upon unload attempt. During inspection, one of the bottles of degreaser had a loose lid, which allowed contents to leak out. Other bottle appears to be intact and whole. No other visible damage. DescribePack: Loose lid, no hole or crack DurationRel: 6 and MitigateEffect: Put in a tote and brought to QA until they could inspect.
